input.problem: Was patient 12724975 diagnosed with hypoxemia until 1 year ago?
input.context: Consider the current time is set to 2105-12-31 23:59:00. Retrieve the subject_id, diagnosis, and diagnosis_date for patient 12724975 to check for hypoxemia diagnosis within the last year.

output.reasoning: To determine if patient 12724975 was diagnosed with hypoxemia within the last year, we need to check the DIAGNOSES_ICD table for any entries with the ICD code corresponding to hypoxemia. We will join this table with D_ICD_DIAGNOSES to get the long title of the diagnosis. The current time is set to 2105-12-31 23:59:00, so we will look for diagnoses from 2104-12-31 23:59:00 onwards. We will filter by subject_id and the relevant ICD code for hypoxemia.
output.SQL: SELECT d.subject_id, d.icd_code, dicd.long_title, d.charttime FROM DIAGNOSES_ICD d JOIN D_ICD_DIAGNOSES dicd ON d.icd_code = dicd.icd_code WHERE d.subject_id = 12724975 AND dicd.long_title LIKE '%hypoxemia%' AND d.charttime >= '2104-12-31 23:59:00'
